item.description: Trailhead:Take I93 exit 28 for NH 49 east.Sandwich Mountain Trail Parking Lot is about 11 miles east of I93 on the right side of the road.The parking lot is not plowed in winter,travel a quarter mile further to the sign flashing how fast you are going,make a U turn and park on the opposite side of the road from the trailhead.We will be hiking up the Sandwich Mountain Trail to Noon(2976')and Jennings(3460')Peaks.Good views of Waterville Valley,Welch and Dickey and Mount Tecumseh.We will hike down the easy Drakes Brook Trail back to the vehicles.Bring Microspikes and snowshoes. 6 miles round trip,7 hours estimated time.-----Steve-----As a condition of attending this meetup you agree to release,hold harmless,and indemnify the organizer(s) and all members of this group from any and all claims for property damage,injury,illness and/or death,including those caused by negligence and or other reasons.You also agree to assume all risk associated with this meetup and agree to know and follow the Hiker Responsibility Code described at www.hikesafe.com
item.how_to_find_us: Black Colorado pick up truck NH2431202
item.name: MODERATE HIKE-JENNINGS PEAK
